constraints.constraint: self.name.size()>0 This will check if a component's name is correct Component name not valid
self.referenceName.size()>0 This will check if a reference's name is correct Reference name not valid
self.referenceName.size()>0 This will check if a reference's name is correct Reference name not valid
self.referenceDefinition<>null This will check if a sub component has a reference A subcomponent needs to reference a component
self.referenceDefinition<>null This will check if a sub component has a reference A subcomponent needs to reference a component
self.fileC=null or self.inlineCcode=null This will check that a data definition only has one content Data must be File or Inline
self.fileC=null or self.inlineCcode=null This will check that an implementation only has one content Source must be File or Inline
InterfaceDefinition.allInstances() -> excluding(self) -> forAll(v | v.name <> self.name ) This will check that all interfaces have different names Interface names must be unique
( ArchitectureDefinition.allInstances()->size() > 0) This will check that the adl is not empty There must be at least one element
